item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
We value your time.

Tell us about your project & build it together.

Get in Touch.

we will answer your questions, scope your project
and discuss your potential fit in style. [contact-form-7 404 "Not Found"]

Join the Community

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. Join the Forum

Email Us

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. support@themebubble.com

Schedule a Call

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. +001-45822475

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Webify Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Ridley Bike Design
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

item.title: Planet Fitness
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

item.title: Marketing for Jrink
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

item.title: Save the World
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. item.title: Sony Camera Website
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

item.title: Adios Concept Design
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
A digital product for everyone who take charge, make noise, and drop-kick the glass ceiling.

The product team viewed the platform selection process as an opportunity to crystalize how they do performance management and approached the search thoughtfully. “We evaluated pretty much every performance management tool that exists.” Our role was to create the project from botom to finish.

Challenges and More

As the company approached 50 employees, Stephanie and the Button team made the decision to start looking for a tool. They needed a solution that could grow with the company and make the entire performance review process easier for everyone, not only for the People Operations department.

The problem with manual solutions is that they become harder to manage as you add more people, and thus more stress, to the system. “When you get to 30 or 40 people, that manual process started to grow from two hours, to three hours, four hours, five hours,” says Stephanie, adding, “It quickly became unscalable.”

The Grand Tour

Design and ease-of-use helped Lattice win over the Button team. The team “loved Lattice’s user experience and usability, being able to have split-screens and the ability to customize the transparency” says Stephanie, adding, “Our CTO and our VP of Engineering came from Google where they had their own internal performance management system and I think it was something our team was used to having.”

“It's difficult to deliver a boutique fashion ecommerce site that showcases a compelling brand experience but also converts. Webify delivered just that.” Guthrie Ferguson, Brand Director

We strategized a theme framework that allowed our designers to create beautifully accessible templates, while baking in enough flexibility to allow merchants to customize the experience for their industry. Site Builder extends the administrative experience, separating content into blocks and allowing for a custom but controlled end product.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: development.themebubble@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
David Gilmour

Making at the sweet spot between
design and sustainability. speed.

  • All
  • Branding
  • Motion
  • Photography
  • UI/UX
Work Experience

I've been fortunate enough to
work for fortune 500 companies.

Jan til Today Freelance Designer at Webfox.com Jan 2018 - Feb 2019 Creative Director at Nike Feb 2018 - Mar 2019 Freelance Designer at MagPlus Apr 2017 - Jul 2018 Web Designer at Envato Jan 2014 - Feb 2016 Head of Ideas at Optimizely More About Me

A fast & Agile Approach
to project creation.

  • 01 Myself
  • 02 Education
  • 03 Skillset

Energetic Adobe Certified Expert (ACE) web designer with 6+ years of experience. Seeking to enhance design excellence at Dujo International. Designed 5 responsive websites per month for Amphimia Global with 99% client satisfaction. Raised UX scores by 35% and customer retention by 18%. Received Awwards prize 2015.

Enthusiastic web designer with 6 years of experience. Responsible for all web design duties at Amphimia Global, Inc. including design of multiple websites, creating UX and UI. Skilled in Adobe Creative Suite.

I graduated with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Economics at the University of the Philippines in the Visayas. I had job experiences related to customer service, data entry, teaching, research, writing, and the financial services industry. I am also a teacher by profession. I passed the Licensure Examination for Teachers dated September 25, 2011.

Graduated with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Economics at the University of the Philippines in the Visayas. I had job experiences related to customer service, data entry, teaching, research, writing, and the financial services industry. I am also a teacher by profession. I passed the Licensure Examination for Teachers dated September 25, 2011. 

As for job responsibilities should deal with screening of resumes, manpower pooling, collecting and processing pre- employment requirements, conducting New Employee Orientation, and assisting in the administration of the employee's benefits. 

Enthusiastic web designer with 6 years of experience. Responsible for all web design duties at Amphimia Global, Inc. including design of multiple websites, creating UX and UI. Skilled in Adobe Creative Suite.

Download CV More About Me

A fast & Agile Approach
to project creation.

We shall talk.

item.content:encoded:
Get in touch today.

Tell us about your project & build it together.

Get in Touch.

we will answer your questions, scope your project
and discuss your potential fit in style.

Join the Community

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. Join the Forum

Email Us

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. support@themebubble.com

Schedule a Call

Bring to the table win-win survival way to ensure proactive domination. +001-45822475
